item.title: Publications
item.description: You can find an up to date list of my publications on Google Scholar

item.title: Back to Blogging
item.description: So I after almost a decade hiatus, I decided to get back to writing blogs again. This is in part triggered by trying to learn new languages in elixir/erlang and rust.

item.title: About
item.description: I am currently working at Voyage Auto building decision making ingredients for autonomous driving. Previously, I was at Apple SPG building autonomous systems, and before that I was conducting research on normative navigation behaviors for mobile service robots at the University of Freiburg as part of my PhD studies. In the more distant past, I have been fortunate to work in a number of labs including DFKI, the Manipulation lab at RI-CMU, TU-Munich, Idiap research institute among others.
